EmailTemplate.description: When a SunPower Salesforce user opens or modifies a Case and issues an RMA, the Salesforce workflow will automatically forward the the Case to the Dealer Service Representative (DSR) of the respective Dealer region, via Email (the DSR contact information is a required field in the Contact record).
EmailTemplate.name: SUPPORT: RMA Issued
EmailTemplate.subject: Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} - RMA Issued
